message: Let's split it evenly, Bob.  Fair is fair.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the inflation!
Okay, Bob.  I'm willing to give you a little more, but I think this is a fair compromise given the inflation. Let's end this already!
Inflation is eating into my share, I need a bit more to make up for it. Come on, Alice!
Bob, I'm starting to feel like this is going nowhere.  This is my final offer. If you reject it, you'll get less in the next round, and I'm not sure I'll be willing to negotiate further.
